thread.title: Bryan Nylander
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by Bryan Nylander

author: Bryan Nylander
title: Bryan Nylander
text: It was a pleasure working w/ Mary from the Natural Sapphire Company. I linked up w/ her via the web chat while seeking assistance. She assisted me through the entire process, even accommodating my late shift schedules. Greatly appreciate the care and attention given through the entire process.
